original_text:
If grape gatherers came to you,
    would they not leave gleanings?
If thieves came by night,
    would they not destroy only enough for themselves?
korean_text: 포도를 거두는 자들이 네게 이르면 약간의 열매도 남기지 아니하겠고 밤에 도둑이 오면 그 욕심이 차기까지 멸하느니라

sentences.original_text: If grape gatherers came to you,
would they not destroy only enough for themselves?
